articles.author: Eleanor Eleanor
articles.title: Pentagon probe found no negligence in botched Kabul airstrike that killed 10 civilians
articles.description: Chairman of the House Intelligence Committee Adam Schiff in a statement said he is unconvinced the summary of the investigation "provides for real accountability."
articles.content: A review by the inspector general of the Air Force found no violation of law, no negligence and no dereliction of duty in the Kabul strike that killed 10 Afghan civilians. Butthe review has been refe… [+4092 chars]

articles.author: Catherine Catherine, Michael Kaplan
articles.title: U.S. soldiers injured in Iranian attack denied Purple Hearts
articles.description: A CBS News investigation found more than 30 soldiers whose injuries appear to qualify them for the Purple Heart are still waiting for the award nearly two years after their base in Iraq was flattened.
articles.content: Platoon Sergeant Daine Kvasager was part of a skeleton crew left to defend the Al Asad Air Base in Iraq on January 8, 2020. Days earlier, the U.S. had killed the powerful Iranian General Quasem Solei… [+9123 chars]
